common.amenitiesIntro: Thoughtful touches already waiting when you arrive.

amenities.title: Private ensuite comfort
amenities.body: Start and end each day with a hot shower, fluffy towels and space that's yours alone.

amenities.title: Sea-view terrace mornings
amenities.body: Slide open the doors to a private terrace for espresso or sunset drinks overlooking Positano.

amenities.title: Cool and quiet nights
amenities.body: Individually controlled air-conditioning and blackout shutters keep the room calm even in August heat.

amenities.title: Terrace big enough for every roommate
amenities.body: Gather on outdoor sofas and tables to share breakfasts, stretch after hikes or capture the skyline together.

amenities.title: All-female comfort
amenities.body: A women-only dorm with ensuite bathroom and vanity space so you never queue for a shower.

amenities.title: Privacy and peace of mind
amenities.body: Each bunk includes curtains, reading lights, charging points and key-card lockers for valuables.

amenities.title: Extra-large shared terrace
amenities.body: Lounge chairs and dining space give your dorm a social living room with Amalfi Coast views.

amenities.title: Dedicated bathroom
amenities.body: Freshen up in a private bathroom stocked with hairdryers, mirrors and plenty of hooks.

amenities.title: Easy access to power
amenities.body: Each bed includes personal sockets, reading lights and key-card lockers for peace of mind.
